description.en: A mysterious scroll that allows the owner to change the type of element on an item without losing the upgrade amount.
description.ar: A mysterious scroll that allows the owner to change the type of element on an item without losing the upgrade amount.
description.br: Um pergaminho misterioso que permite ao proprietário alterar o tipo de elemento em um item, sem perder o valor do fortalecimento.
description.cns: 使用该神秘卷轴可以更改装备上的元素属性类型并且不会丢失该装备的元素属性等级。
description.de: Mysteriöse Schriftrolle, die das Element eines Gegenstands ändert, den Bonus aber beibehält.
description.fi: A mysterious scroll that allows the owner to change the type of element on an item without losing the upgrade amount.
description.fil: A mysterious scroll that allows the owner to change the type of element on an item without losing the upgrade amount.
description.fr: Ce parchemin mystérieux permet de changer d'élément tout en conservant le niveau d'amélioration.
description.id: Scroll misterius yang memungkinkan pemilik untuk mengubah jenis elemen pada item tanpa kehilangan jumlah peningkatan.
description.it: A mysterious scroll that allows the owner to change the type of element on an item without losing the upgrade amount.
description.jp: 属性精錬されているアイテムの属性精錬値を維持したまま、別の属性に変更をすることができる神秘の巻物。
description.kr: 제련값에 상관없이 속성을 변경시켜 주는 신비의 두루마리.
description.nl: A mysterious scroll that allows the owner to change the type of element on an item without losing the upgrade amount.
description.pl: A mysterious scroll that allows the owner to change the type of element on an item without losing the upgrade amount.
description.ru: A mysterious scroll that allows the owner to change the type of element on an item without losing the upgrade amount.
description.sp: Misterioso pergamino que permite cambiar el elemento de un objeto sin perder su nivel de mejora.
description.sw: A mysterious scroll that allows the owner to change the type of element on an item without losing the upgrade amount.
description.th: ม้วนหนังสือลึกลับที่ช่วยให้เจ้าของสามารถเปลี่ยนประเภทของธาตุในรายการโดยไม่สูญเสียจำนวนการอัพเกรด
description.tw: 一個神祕的捲軸，能在不減少精煉等級的狀況下更改屬性
description.vi: Một cuộn bí ẩn cho phép chủ sở hữu thay đổi loại nguyên tố trên vật phẩm mà không mất số tiền nâng cấp.
